channel.title: Looking for some people with experience [P.I Base]
channel.description:
Hello guy's, I am looking for a coder and a client developer for my server who will help me and back me up on coding the current server I am hosting. I have done a lot of work on the server ATM, but there is so much more to do!
I will need someone who has a good amount of experience at coding/client developing.
For proof of my server or general talk contact me here, or at my Skype - Neevbc.
There is a lot of work to do, but it shouldn't be too hard! My server has got a VPS. Been hosted for 4-5 days now, got 5-10 players online most of the time, and will invest in advertising once I fix some stuff up.
I have made up this post cause I am entering a time that I won't have a lot of time to code like I use to.

item.title: Looking for some people with experience [P.I Base]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“neevbc, post:3, topic:547220”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=666123.msg4453316#msg4453316 date=1413065195]
Can I check out your server? No guarantees on help, but being able to see your server would help me decide…
[/quote]
Sure I guess, how do you want me to contact ya?[/quote]
Doesn’t matter imo. Skype is on my profile, so is pm’ing, and etc. so.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for some people with experience [P.I Base]
